original_text: In the thirtieth year, in the fourth month, on the fifth day of the month, as I was among the exiles by the Chebar canal, the heavens were opened, and I saw visions of God.
korean_text: 서른째 해 넷째 달 초닷새에 내가 그발 강 가 사로잡힌 자 중에 있을 때에 하늘이 열리며 하나님의 모습이 내게 보이니

sentences.original_text: on the fifth day of the month,
as I was among the exiles by the Chebar canal,
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그발 강가에 있는 사로잡힌 자 중에 있을 때에,

sentences.original_text: and I saw visions of God.
